div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die
mensis nouembris quo Supra

The said day the ballieis assignit monunday that next
Cumis to Duncan smyth to ansuer' perempturlie to the
borghe strekit one him be Dauid Adamson' for the
wranguys' haldin fra him of xxxij s' et cetera

The saide day Sandy huchosone become prenteis
to William blinsel Coupar for aucht yeris Inmediatlie
tilbe runnyn and tua yeris thareftir for ane franche crovne
in the yer be his hand vphaldin And the saide
William to do till the said Sandy huchonsone it that
accordis to be done tile his prenteis Induring the
said termes

Curia ballivorum de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die
Decembris quosupra

The saide day Comperit patrik leslie befor the aldirman and ballies
sittande In Jugment and present befor thame' ane cors' of gold and a ring
of gold laide in wed tile hyme be ser William Angousone' of fiwe
pundis peroffering the saide weddis befor the Aldirman for the saide fiwe
pundis that thai lay hyme' in wede of

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane' suorne' assis'
William blinseile forspekar that Duncan smyth sall content and pay to Dauid
Adamsone' xviij s' of In part of pament of xxxij s' aucht to the said'
Dauid be the saide Duncan of ane stik of wyne' quhilkis the bailyeis
chargit to pay within terme' of law Ande quhat siluer that beis gottyne of
the said wyne' the saide Duncan salbe' respond to the said Dauid and gif
it ples' the saide Dauid to tak wyne' quhile he be content of the haill
Some' of xxxij s'

The saide day William lamyntone was in amerciament of the court for
the wrangwis' strublance of William blyth and tile amend
as law will and forber in tyme to cum

The said day Will lamyntone in amerciament of the court for the
wrangwis' withhalding of xl d' of the saide Will blythis butht
maile

The saide day Will blyth in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis'
Riding of the saide William lamyntonis hors' without licence
of the said William

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem x die Decembris anno Supra

The saide day Comperit Dauid club with Dauid mar'
his forspekar and schew that Androu pardoner' was his prenteis
eftir the tenor' of ane Indentur and the saide Androw has left
the saide Dauid and passit fra his seruice tharfor he protestit for
his costis Skathis and expensis and for Remed' of law throw
the wantyn of his said prenteis and that he mycht haue him eftiruart
to fulfile the termes of his prenteschip

The said day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next
cumis to Alexander prat to ansuer to the borghe strekit on' him be
Jonhne of Kintor for the wranguis' Intrometing and'
withhaldin fra him of ane flandris langsadile pertening to him
of ayrschipe

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
mensis Decembris quo Supra

The saide day It was appontit betuix Elene of buchan
one that ane part Ande William buchan hir' sone one that vthir
part In maner' and forme eftir follouing that is to say the
said elene sal ourgif hir' coniunctfeftment of the Inlande
liand in the Castalgat quhilkis nov Thomas Ridale Inhabitis
to the said' William And the said William sal Infeft the said
Ellene be possession' in the souerast wys' in ane annuele
Rent of xxiiij s' of ony land that he has for al the dais
of hir' lyve bcaus' the said Elene for necessite mycht
nocht vphald' the said' Inland And' ilkan to keipe
tile vthir it that was condicionit be the fathis of thar bodiis but
ony Reuocacion

Eodem die Andreas lammyntone amerciatur per assisam ex ore
Johannis Waus pro perturbio Alexandri chamer Cuj emendabit ut
iura volunt

Curia balliuorum Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta In
pretorio eiusdem Septimo de mensis Januarij Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Octauo

The saide day comperit sere Dauid Walcar' and the spous'
of Jonhne glenmaluyn and exponit to the balyeis consal
and communite present for the tyme how the said Jonhne was
vesit with the handis of god thir' money yeris bigane
beand' Impotent fra the warld' throw the quhilkis he hed'
disponit ale his gudis and hed nocht to lyve one excepe his
land' alanerlie besekand' his nerrast appering ayr or frendis
gif ony war' or coud' be comprehendit to schew him way
of Supportacion quharone he mycht lyve for his said lande
nocht withstanding thar was nayne comprehendit that offerit him
ony help quharfor' thai protestit Solemptlie in the saide
Jonhnis name that he mycht frelie dispone apone his land'
tile his necessar lyving Sene he hed' nocht to lyve one
and his neid' oppinlie knavyne

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell liell procurator magistri themannj
Crab et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quadraginta denariorum
vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam Robert club Jacente in vico
superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Duncanj clat ex
ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam henricj tulideff ex occidentali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichile reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius
processus Testibus Willelmo Werty martino Kemp et Andrea nachtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad Barram Dauid liell procurator honorabilis
virj domini Johannis Ruthirfurde milite ac prepositi et protestatus fuit In forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quatuordecim solidorum vsualis monete scocie
sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam henricj
tulideff ex orientali ex vna et torrentem a lacu ad molendinj aque
ductum discendendum ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram dicti militis versus
austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boriam Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Werty martino
Kemp et Andrea nachtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus Crukschank capellanus
ac procurator altaris beati Duthacj infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij
de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
Octo solidorum sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore debito et non soluto
de quadam terra wasta Jacente in vico Nauium ex australi parte eiusdem
Ad quam terram accedens nichile reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Werty martino Kemp et Andrea
nachty sergeando

head.add: the appreuing of the Act anent the pament of the wattir malys

div.p:
The said' day the aldirman balyeis Counsale and Communite of the said' burghe
gathtreit representand the body of the toune and Curcualie Inquerit
be thomas leslie ane of the balyeis for the commone weile of the tovne
ratifeit and appreuit the louabile Act maid' Obefor that ale personis' that
fischis the wattiris of the said' burghe' sale pay the maile of the
samyn to the aldirman and balyeis quhome It efferis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
Januarij quo Supra

The saide day William lammyntone grantit to get the vnicorne
to Richerde flessar that he laid' him in wed for xiiij s' betuix
this and candilmes next to Cum or within aucht dais thareftir and deliuer
it to him he gevand' to him the said' xiiij s' and gif the said' William
falyeis he sal pay iiij s' to the saide Richerd'

The saide day the balyes assignit friday that next cumis to Androw
ancroft to ansuer' perempturlie to the borghe Strekit one him be
Dauid Kintor for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xvij s'

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander scrogis
to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him for the wranguis' haldin
fra him Dauid Kintor of v li' lent siluer j barrel and demi salmond' and x s'
for costis

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Cullan forspekar that Alexander chamer sal ger' curs' for the franche crovne
clamit one Donald baxtar and gif the said crovne beis gottyne
the said alexander sal mak fath that that is the crovne that Donald'
baxtar gaf him and that beand' done the said Donald sal gif him
ane vthir franche crovne et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die Januarij anno quo Supra

The saide day Dauid fynne grantit him Souerte to William
of gareauche for Samekile fraucht as he can preywe
Richerd Waus is avand' to him

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais
to William gareauche to ansuer' perempturlie to Richerd
Waus for his clerk fee

The saide say the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday monunday
that next cumis to Jonhne Sanclar to ansuer' perumpturlie to the
borghe' strekit one him be gilbert menyes for the wranguys'
haldin fra him of tua barrelis of Salmond'

head.add: Androw murray thomas prat Robert crag

div.p:
The said day Androw murray Thomas prat and Robert
crag and gilbert menyeis with William blinsell forspekar' for tham and vthiris the
merchandis schew how that thai hed gevin vp the gudis
quhilkis thai hed in Cornelis boll schip redy in writ
to the lottyn' for the recompensin of the ankir and cabill
tynt be the said Skippar and protestit that the personis
of the quhilkis the namys was red in Jugement and hed gudis
in the said Schip being warnit and comperit nocht to
vpgif thar' gudis to the said recompensacion sald' releyve
the said personis of al Skathis et cetera witnes the aldirman Androw cullan
Richard' Waus balyeis Androw fyf William Wormet and gilbert litstar

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die Januarij anno quo Supra

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem gilberti futhes
div.p:
Alexander Rede Johannes colisone Thomas prat Willelmus blinsele
Willelmus portar Willelmus futhes Thomas Waus matheus branche
Johannes blak Johannes retre Alexander gray Johannes grig Willelmus murray
Thomas chapman et Johannes Watsone burgenses dicti burgi Jurati
dicunt quod quondam petrus futhes frater gilberti futhes latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de
quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico inferiori ecclesie ex boreali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Walterj mernys ex orientali ex vna
et terram Richardi Waus ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem
viam regiam versus austrum et terram mathei Wricht versus boriam Et
quod dictus gilbertus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam petrj
fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod
dicta terra valet nunc per annum sex s' octo d' et valuit v s' tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per
seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri regis per dimidium
annj aut eocirca ab mortem dicti petrj In defectu veri heredis Jus
suum hucusque minime prosequentis datum et cetera

The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be ane
Suorne assis' William blinsele forspekar that Williame
buchane sal pay to Ellen' Colly his modir xl s' tharof
xx s' within viij dais and vthir xx s' at pasche next
hereftir for the ij ros' noblis clamit be his obligacion

The said day William of futhes oblist him be the
fath of his bodie to margaret crag to putt hir' in
lauchfull sesin of the lande liand' in the nethirkirkgat
that scho was in Stat of obefor in coniunctfeftment with
vmquhil peter futhes hir' Spous' for al the dais of
hir' lyve within xl dais and falyeing tharof to pay hir'
tene li' Scottis money within xl dais thareftir becaus'
the said margaret Renuncit hir' coniunctfeftment of the said
land to caus' gilbert futhes his brothir sone be put
in the fee of the said land' And the said gilbert oblist
him be the fath of his bodie to freithe and releyf the
said William vndir the pane of xl li' tharof xxtj li'
to the king and vthiris xx li' to the kirk apon the
quhilkis the said William and margaret askit Instrumentis
witnes sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman Alexander rede Johne Colison'
Alexander gray William blinsele Thomas prat and thomas chepman
